from vpython import *

# Define and initialize Length_I and Radius_I
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1

# Create a 3D display
scene = canvas(width=800, height=800, center=vec(0,-Length_I/2,0), background=vec(0.5,0.5,0))

# Create the pendulum
pendulum = sphere(pos=vec(0,-Length_I,0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.yellow)
roof = box(pos=vec(0,0,0), length=0.2, height=0.01, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
rod = cylinder(pos=roof.pos, axis=pendulum.pos-roof.pos, radius=0.01)

# Physical properties
g = 9.8
theta = pi/4
omega = sqrt(g/Length_I)
dt = 0.01

# Animation
while True:
    rate(100) # limit the number of loops per second
    pendulum.radius = Radius_I
    theta = theta * cos(omega * dt)
